BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20055603 SCX, a proposed site for an intermediate/high school facility located generally at 922-928 Simpson Street, Council District no. 16, Borough of the Bronx.
